chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall pl0 pl1 : prec_list, pl0 <> prec_empty -> union_pl pl0 pl1 <> prec_empty

Premises:
union_pl = fix union_pl (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) {struct pl0} : prec_list := match pl0 with | prec_cons a pl00 pl01 => prec_cons a pl00 (union_pl pl01 pl1) | prec_empty => pl1 end : prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
pl_compat = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl0 = prec_empty /\ pl1 = prec_empty \/ pl0 <> prec_empty /\ pl1 <> prec_empty : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
union_pl_2 : forall pl0 pl1 : prec_list, union_pl pl0 pl1 = prec_empty -> pl0 = prec_empty
pl_compatible_sym : forall pl0 pl1 : prec_list, pl_compatible pl0 pl1 -> pl_compatible pl1 pl0
prec_occur_ind : forall P : prec_list -> ad -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a) -> (forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> P pl0 b -> P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b) -> (forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> P pl1 b -> P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b) -> forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur p a -> P p a
Inductive prec_occur : prec_list -> ad -> Prop := prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a | prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b | prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
pl_compatible = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => exists n : nat, pl_tl_length pl0 n /\ pl_tl_length pl1 n : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
st_compatible = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some pl0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl1 -> pl_compatible pl0 pl1 : state -> state -> Prop
prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
mpl_compat_0 : forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl0) (M1 prec_list c pl1) -> pl_compat pl0 pl1
prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a
union_mpl = fix union_mpl (s0 s1 : state) {struct s0} : state := match s0 with | @M0 _ => match s1 with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ c1 pl1 => union_mpl_0 c1 pl1 s0 | @M2 _ s10 s11 => M2 prec_list s10 s11 end | @M1 _ c0 pl0 => match s1 with | @M1 _ c1 pl1 => union_mpl_0 c1 pl1 s0 | _ => union_mpl_0 c0 pl0 s1 end | @M2 _ s00 s01 => match s1 with | @M0 _ => M2 prec_list s00 s01 | @M1 _ c1 pl1 => union_mpl_0 c1 pl1 s0 | @M2 _ s10 s11 => M2 prec_list (union_mpl s00 s10) (union_mpl s01 s11) end end : state ->...-> state
union_pl_1 : forall pl : prec_list, union_pl prec_empty pl = pl
union_pl_0 : forall pl : prec_list, union_pl pl prec_empty = pl
sem_listes_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d p (tcons hd tl) -> p <> prec_empty
u_conv_lr_0_r : forall (p0 : preDTA) (pl0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p0 pl0 t -> Prop
u_conv_lr_1_r : forall (p0 : preDTA) (pl0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p0 pl0 t -> Prop
not_true_is_false : forall b : bool, b <> true -> b = false
pl_compatible_empt_l : forall p : prec_list, pl_compatible prec_empty p -> p = prec_empty
pl_compatible_empt_r : forall p : prec_list, pl_compatible p prec_empty -> p = prec_empty
upl_conv_1_img_1 : forall p : prec_list, upl_conv_1 p = prec_empty -> p = prec_empty
upl_conv_0_img_1 : forall p : prec_list, upl_conv_0 p = prec_empty -> p = prec_empty
pl_tl_length_rec_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (H : pl_tl_length pl 0) (H0 : liste_reconnait d pl tl) => let H1 : pl = pl -> 0 = 0 -> 0 = lst_length tl := match H in (pl_tl_length p n) return (p = pl -> n = 0 -> 0 = lst_length tl) with | pl_tl_O => fun (H1 : prec_empty = pl) (H2 : 0 = 0) => (fun H3 : prec_empty = pl => let H4 : prec_empty = pl := H3 in eq_ind prec_empty (fun _ : prec_list => 0 = 0 -> 0 = lst_length tl) (fun _ : 0 = 0 => let H6 : liste_reconnait d prec_empty tl := eq_ind_r (fun pl0 : prec_list => liste_reconnait d pl0 tl) H0 H3 in let H7...
prec_list_rec : forall P : prec_list -> Set, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_ind : forall P : prec_list -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_rect : forall P : prec_list -> Type, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
semantic_equiv_1_4_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat), l <> tnil -> rec_list_terms d ls l n = true -> rec_list_terms d (prec_cons a la ls) l (S n) = true
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
pl_sum : forall pl : prec_list, pl = prec_empty \/ (exists (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl = prec_cons a la ls)

```coq
intros pl0 pl1 H.
induction pl0.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite IHpl0. intro H1. apply union_pl_2 in H1. contradiction.
Qed.```

original: intros pl0 pl1 H. induction pl0. - simpl. auto. - simpl. rewrite IHpl0. intro H1. apply union_pl_2 in H1. contradiction.
